predictions.text: A bill will be introduced in either chamber of the U.S. Congress that caps consumer credit-card APRs at 10% or less nationwide (explicit numeric cap in statutory text), by 2026-03-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified if Congress.gov shows introduction of a bill whose text sets a maximum APR for credit cards at <=10% (or a formula that cannot exceed 10%) applicable nationally (not limited to servicemembers/SDR).
monitoring_signals: Congress.gov search alerts for "credit card" AND "10%" AND "APR"
House Financial Services / Senate Banking press releases on credit-card rate caps
White House/UST remarks endorsing a numeric cap
predictions.rationale: The topic is already in the political discourse; introduction is easier than passage and likely used as messaging around consumer costs.

predictions.text: At least one U.S. GSIB (JPM, BAC, C, WFC, GS, MS) will explicitly reference the 2025 Shared National Credit (SNC) review in its 2026 Q1 earnings call transcript or 10-Q risk discussion, by 2026-05-15 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified if a 2026 Q1 earnings call transcript or 10-Q filing for any listed bank contains an explicit reference to "Shared National Credit" or "SNC" in the context of syndicated/leveraged-loan risk, underwriting, or monitoring.
monitoring_signals: 10-Q filings for JPM/BAC/C/WFC/GS/MS (SEC EDGAR) keyword alerts: "Shared National Credit", "SNC"
Earnings call transcript keyword alerts via Refinitiv/FactSet
Bank investor presentations discussing leveraged lending/syndicated loan monitoring
predictions.rationale: SNC findings often flow into large-bank risk language when regulators publicly flag underwriting/monitoring weaknesses.

predictions.text: The ICE U.S. Dollar Index (DXY) will close below 95.0 on at least one U.S. trading day, by 2026-06-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified if ICE (or widely cited market data vendors such as Bloomberg/Refinitiv) show a daily close for DXY < 95.0 on any date on/before 2026-06-30.
monitoring_signals: Daily DXY closes
UST term premium / real yield moves
Newsflow on Fed independence/political interference and foreign capital flows
predictions.rationale: If the 'Sell America' theme persists, USD weakness can extend, but 95 is a relatively deep move and requires sustained risk-off or policy credibility concerns.

predictions.text: LBMA Gold Price (PM) in USD will print at least 10% above its 2026-01-12 LBMA PM level on at least one fixing date, by 2026-06-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified if LBMA publishes a Gold Price PM (USD) on any date <=2026-06-30 that is >= 1.10 * (LBMA Gold Price PM USD on 2026-01-12).
monitoring_signals: LBMA PM fixings
Real yields (UST TIPS) and inflation breakevens
Central bank gold purchase headlines and ETF flows
predictions.rationale: Heightened institutional-risk pricing and USD softness can drive a non-linear bid for gold; 10% in ~6 months is plausible but not base-case.

predictions.text: OFAC will designate at least 3 non-Iranian individuals and/or entities in a single sanctions action explicitly tied to Iranian petroleum/petrochemical sales, shipping, or sanctions evasion, by 2026-06-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified if an OFAC press release/designation notice lists >=3 designees that are not Iranian persons/entities and states the action is for Iran oil/petrochemical trade, shipping, or evasion (e.g., E.O. 13846/13902 or related authorities).
monitoring_signals: OFAC press releases and SDN list updates mentioning Iran oil/petrochemicals
Treasury briefings on secondary sanctions enforcement
Reuters reporting on Iran oil flows and crackdowns on shippers/traders
predictions.rationale: Secondary-sanctions rhetoric often precedes enforcement packages targeting facilitators outside Iran, especially shipping/trading nodes.

predictions.text: Apple will release a developer beta of iOS 19 (or iOS 19.x) that includes an Apple-documented Siri feature using Google Gemini for at least one category of requests (e.g., "Ask Gemini" handoff), by 2026-06-15 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified if Apple’s official developer release notes, WWDC session materials, or Apple Developer documentation for an iOS 19 developer beta describe Siri invoking/handing off to Google Gemini (explicitly named) for any user-facing capability.
monitoring_signals: WWDC 2026 agenda/session titles and Apple Developer docs
iOS 19 beta release notes mentioning Gemini
Statements from Apple/Google PR confirming integration scope
predictions.rationale: Once a partner is selected, the first visible milestone is typically WWDC-era beta exposure, even if rollout is staged.

predictions.text: Alphabet will disclose (in a 10-Q/10-K, earnings call, or other SEC-filed material) a quantified Apple-related consideration for Gemini/Siri distribution or licensing with an annualized value of at least $20B (USD), by 2026-10-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified if Alphabet (or Apple) discloses a numeric payment/consideration amount tied specifically to Gemini/Siri distribution/licensing with annualized value >=$20B, in an SEC filing or earnings call transcript.
monitoring_signals: GOOGL and AAPL 10-Q/10-K keyword scans: "Gemini", "Siri", "licensing", "consideration"
Antitrust/regulatory filings that may force payment disclosure
Analyst Q&A focusing on economics of the partnership
predictions.rationale: Economics may be material but companies often avoid explicit quantification unless compelled by accounting or regulatory factors.

predictions.text: Meta will report Reality Labs operating loss at least 15% lower (less negative) year-over-year in its 2026 Q2 earnings release (quarter ended 2026-06-30), by 2026-08-05 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified if Meta’s 2026 Q2 earnings release/10-Q shows Reality Labs operating loss (segment operating income) improved by >=15% versus 2025 Q2 (i.e., loss magnitude reduced by >=15%).
monitoring_signals: Meta headcount updates and additional cost-reduction announcements
Reality Labs capex guidance changes
Segment revenue trends (Quest hardware/VR content)
predictions.rationale: Announced cuts should flow into segment costs with lag; a 15% YoY improvement is meaningful but achievable if spending discipline holds.

predictions.text: A top-20 U.S. health system (by revenue) will publicly announce production deployment (not just pilot) of an OpenAI/Torch-branded healthcare data workflow product integrated with its EHR or clinical data platform, by 2026-09-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified if a health system press release, case study, or conference presentation states an OpenAI/Torch product is deployed in production and integrated with its EHR/clinical data stack (Epic/Cerner/Meditech/etc.), naming the health system and describing live use.
monitoring_signals: Health system press releases and HIMSS/HLTH conference agendas
OpenAI enterprise customer announcements in healthcare
EHR vendor partner marketplaces and integration listings
predictions.rationale: Acquisitions in healthcare are usually aimed at accelerating enterprise deployments; the key uncertainty is compliance/security timelines in large systems.

predictions.text: The U.S. Office of the National Coordinator for Health IT (ONC) will publish a formal RFI/draft guidance/proposed rule that explicitly addresses AI model transparency, auditability, or safety requirements for certified EHR technology, by 2026-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verified if ONC posts (Federal Register or ONC website) an RFI, proposed rule, or official guidance that explicitly references AI/ML models and sets or requests comment on transparency/audit/safety requirements tied to the Health IT Certification Program.
monitoring_signals: Federal Register notices from ONC mentioning AI/ML
ONC interoperability/certification rulemaking calendar
Congressional hearings/GAO reports prompting ONC action on EHR-AI integration
predictions.rationale: As clinical AI tools integrate into EHR workflows, ONC is a natural locus for baseline transparency and safety expectations, though timing depends on administrative priorities.
